title: 猪脚勇闯光圈科技实验中心（GM小组出品）
author: scc4000

replies.author: scc4000
replies.txt_content:
这是我们的猪脚（无视两西瓜）一个平凡的minecraft小人
[attach]805[/attach]

replies.author: scc4000
replies.txt_content:
有一天，他一觉醒来，发现自己在一个陌生的地方。
[attach]806[/attach]

replies.author: scc4000
replies.txt_content:
真陌生啊……
[attach]807[/attach]

replies.author: scc4000
replies.txt_content:
不过，在我们感叹的时候，他已经想着怎样逃出去了。可是……
[attach]808[/attach]

replies.author: scc4000
replies.txt_content:
猪脚：这个是啥玩意？
（僵尸兄死于某场事故）
[attach]809[/attach]

replies.author: scc4000
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 scc4000 于 2010-11-18 21:21 编辑

（某场事故残渣）
[attach]812[/attach]

replies.author: scc4000
replies.txt_content:
猪脚：不过说起来这是啥地方呢？
[attach]813[/attach]

replies.author: scc4000
replies.txt_content:
猪脚：嗯，给我看看……靠！把劳资关在非正常人类实验中心？！不想活啦！！！鹳狸猿你给我滚出来！！！
[attach]814[/attach]

replies.author: scc4000
replies.txt_content:

[attach]815[/attach]

replies.txt_content:

replies.txt_content:
